QuestData.Title: I Am the Blade of the Light
QuestData.Description:
It's time to put all that power and training into the field.
Take the empowered ranseur, and cut a swath of destruction through the Scourge!
We'll meet you at the doorstep of Deatholme.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the empowered ranseur to slay Scourge in the Dead Scar.

Objectives.Objective: Scourge slain in the Dead Scar
